samples.instruction: 11th Admission à®Žà®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿? Online counselling process à®Žà®©à¯à®©?
samples.current_output:
**11th Admission Process (TN):**

**Step 1: Online Registration**
- Website: tnschools.gov.in
- Period: Usually May-June (after 10th results)
- Fill personal details, school preferences

**Step 2: 10th Marks Entry**
- Results auto-fetch from board
- Verify correctness

**Step 3: School Selection**
- Select up to 10-15 schools (preference order)
- Government / Aided / Matriculation

**Step 4: Seat Allotment**
- Based on marks & preference
- Reservation rules apply:
  - SC: 18%
  - ST: 1%
  - MBC/DNC: 20%
  - BC: 26.5%
  - BCM: 3.5%
  - General: 31%

**Step 5: Reporting**
- Go to allotted school
- Submit documents
- Pay fees (if applicable)

**Stream Selection:**
- Choose based on career goal
- Science (Maths): Engineering
- Science (Bio): Medicine
- Commerce: CA, Business
- Arts: Law, Civil Services

**Documents Needed:**
- 10th Marksheet (Original + 3 copies)
- TC (Transfer Certificate)
- Community Certificate
- Income Certificate (for fee concession)
- Aadhaar Card
- Passport photos - 6

**Important:**
- Govt schools: FREE
- Aided schools: Minimal fees
- Matriculation: Higher fees

**Helpline:** DGE helpline number (varies each year)

samples.instruction: à®Žà®©à¯ à®ªà®¿à®³à¯à®³à¯ˆ career choice-à® accept à®ªà®£à¯à®£ à®®à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®¯à®². à®Žà®©à¯à®© à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Generation gap bridge: 1) Listen to their reasons - genuinely try to understand 2) Research that field - income potential, growth, stability 3) Meet professionals in that career - get real picture 4) Trial period suggestion - internship, shadowing 5) Your fears express - but don't impose 6) Compromise explore - related but acceptable field 7) Remember: It's their life to live. Reality: Many non-traditional careers successful today. Trust your upbringing - they'll be fine!

samples.instruction: Computer courses free-ya enge padikkalaam?
samples.current_output: Free computer training: 1) TNSDC IT courses - Web, Data entry, Tally 2) NIELIT (Government) - CCC, O Level 3) Digital India Programme - Basic computer 4) CSC (Common Service Centre) - Digital literacy 5) Library-based free classes. Online free: SWAYAM, NPTEL, Coursera (audit mode). Employment exchange computer labs free practice available. Apply through respective websites.

samples.instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Drop year waste of time, stigma ulladhu
samples.current_output: Fact: Fact: Drop year = Strategic investment. Many IIT/AIIMS toppers took drop. Reality: 60-70% NEET qualifiers are droppers. No employer asks about gap year for doctors/engineers. Better to take time and get right career than settle for less. Productive drop year > Rushed wrong decision. Society's opinion < Your career satisfaction.

samples.instruction: à®‰à®£à¯à®®à¯ˆà®¯à®¾ à®ªà¯Šà®¯à¯à®¯à®¾: Myth: Arts à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®šà¯à®šà®¾ future à®‡à®²à¯à®²à¯ˆ
samples.current_output: à®‰à®£à¯à®®à¯ˆ: Fact: Arts graduates options: IAS/IPS (UPSC - Arts background preferred), Banking, Teaching, Law, Journalism, Civil Services, HR, Social Work. Many IAS toppers are Arts graduates. Salary depends on job not degree. BA + competitive exam preparation = excellent career. Arts graduates excel in UPSC due to writing skills. Don't underestimate humanities!

samples.instruction: Exam day-la udambu sariyilla - enna option irukku?
samples.current_output: Medical certificate vaangi submit pannunga. Board exams-kku supplementary exam ezhuthalaam. University exams-kku medical re-exam apply pannalam. NEET/JEE-kku next attempt try pannalam. Documents maintain pannunga.

samples.current_output: Entrepreneurship training: 1) MSME-DI (District Industries Centre) - free EDP (Entrepreneurship Development Programme) 2) TNSDC business skills 3) NIESBUD courses 4) PMEGP training before loan 5) Startup TN programmes. Duration: 1-4 weeks. Topics: Business plan, finance, marketing, legal compliance. DIC-à®²à¯ register à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®©à®¾à®²à¯ subsidies, loans easier. Free mentorship available.

samples.instruction: NEET Biology à®Žà®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®ªà¯à®ªà®¤à¯? NCERT enough-à®†?
samples.current_output: Biology strategy: NCERT = Bible for NEET Biology. 90%+ questions NCERT-à®‡à®²à®¿à®°à¯à®¨à¯à®¤à¯ direct/indirect. How to study: 1) Line by line reading 2) Diagrams by hand draw 3) Tables, flowcharts memorize 4) Previous year questions practice 5) NCERT exemplar problems. Additional: MTG, Trueman's for extra practice. Botany vs Zoology: Equal weightage. High scoring: Human Physiology, Genetics, Ecology.

samples.instruction: NEET-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu? Endha books padikkanum?
samples.current_output:
**NEET Preparation:**

**2-Year Plan:**
- Class 11: NCERT foundation, Concepts
- Class 12: NCERT revision, Mock tests, Previous papers

**Books:**

**Physics:**
- NCERT (Must!)
- HC Verma, DC Pandey

**Chemistry:**
- NCERT (Read multiple times!)
- MS Chouhan (Organic)
- N Awasthi (Physical)

**Biology:**
- NCERT (90% questions!)
- Trueman's, MTG Guide

**Daily Routine:**
- 5:30 AM: Physics/Chemistry
- Afternoon: Biology
- Evening: Weak subject
- Night: Revision/MCQs

**Tips:**
1. NCERT 5-6 times
2. Bio diagrams daily
3. Physics numericals daily
4. 50-100 MCQs daily
5. Weekly full test

samples.instruction: National Scholarship Portal (NSP) moolam endhendha scholarships kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: NSP scholarships: 1) Pre-matric SC/ST/OBC 2) Post-matric SC/ST/OBC 3) MHRD Merit scholarship 4) PM scholarship for defence personnel wards 5) Minority scholarships 6) Top class education scholarship. Apply: www.scholarships.gov.in. One portal for 100+ schemes. Documents: Aadhaar, bank account, income certificate, caste certificate, marks. Deadline: October-November usually.

samples.instruction: Calculator/Mathematical tables exam-la allowed-aa?
samples.current_output: Depends on exam: Board exams (10th, 12th): Not allowed. NEET: Not allowed. JEE: Virtual calculator on screen only. Engineering semester: Usually allowed (non-programmable). CA/CMA: Specific models allowed. GATE: Virtual calculator. SSC/Banking: Not allowed. Mathematical tables: Some exams provide, some allow bringing. Always check: Admit card instructions. Penalty for unauthorized items: Disqualification possible.

samples.instruction: CMA (Cost Accountant) padippu pathi sollunga?
samples.current_output: ICMAI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation 2) Intermediate 3) Final. 3 year practical training. Total duration: 3-4 years. Fee: Foundation â‚¹6,000, Inter â‚¹23,000, Final â‚¹25,000. Manufacturing companies-la athiga demand. Costing, budgeting expertise.

samples.instruction: Bharatanatyam, Carnatic music padikka government institution irukka?
samples.current_output: Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University, Kalakshetra Foundation (Chennai), Government Music Colleges irukku. Diploma, Degree courses available. Fee miga koraivau. Talented students-kku scholarship undu.

samples.instruction: Sexual harassment face panren. Yaarai approach panrathu?
samples.current_output: Report to: 1) Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) - mandatory in every college 2) Women Helpline: 181 3) Police: Women's cell 4) National Commission for Women: ncw.nic.in 5) UGC grievance cell. Evidence: Screenshot messages, note incidents. Support: Counselling available. Legal: Sexual Harassment at Workplace Act protects students too. Confidentiality maintained. Don't blame yourself. Speak up - silence enables harassers.

samples.instruction: SDAT coaching centre-la sera enna seyyanum?
samples.current_output: SDAT (Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu) ovvoru district-layum coaching centres vaichirikku. Age: 8-14 years. Selection trials nadakkum. Free coaching, kit, diet allowance kedaikum. District Sports Officer-a contact pannunga.

samples.instruction: MBBS/BDS admission-ku Tamil Nadu-la enna seiya venum?
samples.current_output: NEET exam compulsory. Steps: 1) NEET ezhuthunga 2) TN Medical Selection Committee counselling-ku apply pannunga 3) Online choice filling 4) Govt/Private medical college allotment. Govt college fee: Yearly â‚¹13,500. 7.5% govt school students-ku separate reservation.

samples.current_output: Top institutes: 1) NIFT Chennai - National level 2) AIFD Chennai 3) JD Institute of Fashion. Admission: NIFT - entrance exam (January). Courses: B.Des Fashion Design (4 years), Diploma (1-2 years). Eligibility: 12th any stream. Fees: NIFT â‚¹2-3 lakh/year, Private â‚¹50,000-1.5 lakh/year. Jobs: Fashion houses, Garment industry, Freelance designer. Chennai = garment hub = good placement.

samples.instruction: Apprenticeship training eppadi join aavadhu? Stipend kidaikkuma?
samples.current_output: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS): ITI/Diploma mudithavargalukku. Register: www.apprenticeshipindia.gov.in. Duration: 1-3 years depending on trade. Stipend: â‚¹8,000-15,000/month (govt subsidy ulladhu). Companies: TCS, L&T, Hyundai, Railways, BHEL - all hire apprentices. Benefits: Real experience, permanent job chance 70%+. Documents: ITI certificate, Aadhaar, bank account.

samples.current_output:
**TNPSC (Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission):**

**à®Žà®©à¯à®© à®‡à®¤à¯?**
- TN à®…à®°à®šà¯ à®µà¯‡à®²à¯ˆà®•à®³à¯à®•à¯à®•à®¾à®© à®¤à¯‡à®°à¯à®µà¯ à®¨à®Ÿà®¤à¯à®¤à¯à®®à¯ à®…à®®à¯ˆà®ªà¯à®ªà¯
- Group 1, 2, 2A, 4 exams
- Technical, Non-technical posts

**Major Exams:**

**1. Group 1 (CSSE):**
- Posts: Deputy Collector, DSP, AD, RDO
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Salary: â‚¹56,100-1,77,500
- Toughest TNPSC exam

**2. Group 2 (CCSE-II):**
- Posts: Sub-Registrar, Assistant, Audit Inspector
- Eligibility: Degree
- Salary: â‚¹35,400-1,12,400

**3. Group 2A:**
- Posts: Junior Assistant, Bill Collector, Typist
- Eligibility: Degree (most posts)
- Salary: â‚¹19,500-62,000

**4. Group 4 (CCSE-IV):**
- Posts: Junior Assistant, Typist, Village Admin Officer
- Eligibility: 10th/12th pass
- Salary: â‚¹19,500-62,000
- Most vacancies!

**5. Group 3 (Technical):**
- Posts: Junior Engineer, Surveyor
- Eligibility: Diploma/Degree
- Department-wise recruitment

**Exam Pattern (General):**

| Stage | Marks | Papers |
|-------|-------|--------|
| Prelims | 200 | GS + Aptitude |
| Mains | 300 | GS + Language |
| Interview | 40 (Group 1 only) | - |

**Age Limit:**
- General: 21-32 years
- BC/MBC: +5 years
- SC/ST: No limit

**Apply:** tnpsc.gov.in

samples.instruction: Class 8-ku appuram enna padikkalam? Endha stream select seyvadhu?
samples.current_output:
**After Class 8 Options:**

**Option 1: Regular School (9-12)**
- Class 9-10: Same for all
- Class 11-12: Choose stream

**Streams:**
| Stream | Subjects | Career |
|--------|----------|--------|
| Science-Maths | PCM | Engineering |
| Science-Bio | PCB | Medicine |
| Commerce | Accounts | CA, Banking |
| Arts | History | Law, Civil Services |

**Option 2: ITI** - After 8th/10th, 1-2 years, Direct jobs

**Option 3: Polytechnic** - After 10th, 3 years diploma

**How to Decide:**
1. Your interest
2. 10th marks
3. Career goal
4. Family situation

**Guidance:** School counselor, tnsdc.in
